QuestData.Title: Little Hatchlings
QuestData.Description: I have seen the cruel experiments that the Shan'ze are performing on their island to the northwest.$B$BThe Shan'ze raise baby serpents from the egg. They keep the young in tiny cages, surrounded by squalor and filth.$B$BThe cruelest gaolers starve and torture them.$B$BWe must save as many hatchlings as we can. You have my full permission to punish any mogu that gets in your way!
